definition: mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
to prepare herbal medicine by roasting or parching (in a pan)
to sauté/to fry/to dry by heating

sentences.english: They raced through the city in jeeps with mounted cannon .
sentences.chinese: 他們乘坐裝有機關炮的吉普車迅速穿過城市。

sentences.english: Our fighter planes are all armed with cannon.
sentences.chinese: 我們的戰鬥機都裝備了機關炮。
